plugin-data.name: ImageGallery Pro
plugin-data.description: Image gallery (pro version) for Bludit3 based on novaGallery and SimpleLightbox.

drop-files-here-or-click-to-upload: Drop files here or click to upload.
file-is-to-big-Max-file-size:: File is to big. Max file size:
this-is-not-a-jpeg-or-png: This is not a JPEG or PNG.
file-names-of-uploaded-images-will-be-mo: File names of uploaded images will be modified for maximum compatibility (e.g. no spaces & special characters, lower case). Images with the same file name will be overwritten.
this-is-the-title-of-the-gallery-shown-i: This is the title of the gallery shown in frontend (optional).
only-published-content-appears-in-this-l: Only published content appears in this list. Remove the selected page to deactivate the image gallery.
start-typing-to-see-a-list-of-suggestion: Start typing to see a list of suggestions.
default-is-\"white\"-if-a-custom-css-fil: Default is "White". If a custom CSS file is used for the image gallery, "Default" should be selected. In the Pro version, custom colors can be set in the ImageGallery Pro settings.
if-activated,-the-stored-images-will-not: If activated, the stored images will not be deleted on uninstall.
this-defines-how-the-images-are-sorted-s: This defines how the images are sorted. Sorting by "age" is based on EXIF data in the images. If the EXIF data is missing, this kind of sorting may not work correctly.
settings-will-only-effects-future-upload: Settings will only effects future uploads.
max-width-or-height-in-pixel: Max. width or height in pixel.
image-quality-for-thumbnails-(1-100)-hig: Image quality for thumbnails (1-100). Higher quality effects higher file size.
image-quality-for-large-image-(1-100),-v: Image quality for large image (1-100), viewed in lightbox. Higher quality effects higher file size.
album-name-is-also-the-name-of-the-folde: Album name is also the name of the folder on the server.
if-no-title-is-entered,-the-album-name-w: If no title is entered, the album name will be used for display.
page-where-the-album-should-be-displayed: Page where the album should be displayed.
remove-the-selected-page-to-remove-the-a: Remove the selected page to remove the album from that page. This setting only takes effect if the 'Single album on pages' feature is activated.
error:-album-could-not-be-deleted: Error: album could not be deleted.
error:-could-not-save-album-settings: Error: Could not save album settings.
error:-image-could-not-be-deleted: Error: Image could not be deleted.
enable-single-albums-on-particular-pages: Enable Single Albums on Particular Pages.
in-addition-to-the-gallery-with-all-albu: In addition to the gallery with all albums and images, single albums can also be assigned to specific pages. For performance reasons, this function should only be activated when it is used.
if-feature-is-enabled,-you-can-add-an-sp: If feature is enabled, you can add an specific album to an individual page.
this-defines-how-the-albums-are-sorted-a: This defines how the albums are sorted. Alphabetical sorting uses the album name. Sorting by "age" is based on the images contained in the albums.
